byline.contributor: Zahra Nader reported from Kabul and Rod Nordland from London.
byline.original: By ZAHRA NADER and ROD NORDLAND

lead_paragraph: Fleeing an arranged marriage, the couple were shot to death by family members in what is often called an honor killing. There have been no arrests.
snippet: Fleeing an arranged marriage, the couple were shot to death by family members in what is often called an honor killing. There have been no arrests....

headline.main: Mob Kills Eloped Lovers After Storming Afghan Police Station
headline.print_headline: Mob Kills Eloped Lovers After Storming a Police Station in Eastern Afghanistan
